query:
SELECT title, COUNT(*) as count, GROUP_CONCAT(id ORDER BY id) as ids
FROM storyChapters
GROUP BY title
HAVING count > 1
ORDER BY title;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2CEWC7GGoWezLtD.root --database ZVkt36csMB4sQeeKBXWHBG --execute SELECT title, COUNT(*) as count, GROUP_CONCAT(id ORDER BY id) as ids
FROM storyChapters
GROUP BY title
HAVING count > 1
ORDER BY title;
